humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that a single left axillary lymph node is positive for metastatic carcinoma, which corresponds to N1 according to the AJCC staging system (New Rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes). The presence of extranodal extension does not affect the N stage in this case.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that a single left axillary lymph node is positive for metastatic carcinoma with extranodal extension. This corresponds to an N1 stage according to the AJCC staging system, which ignores any substaging information.
